name: Rock, Paper, Wizards!
description:
Build your army, seek adventure, and Rock, Paper, Wizards!

• WILD TACTICAL BATTLES •
Negotiate, flee, and fight your way through insane multiplayer encounters!

• UNLIMITED ADVENTURES •
Explore infinite lands populated by player from around the world. Some are friendly... some are not.

• UNIQUE HEROES •
Command a unique army with over 100,000,000,000 possible soldiers to collect and train!

• FORM A CLAN •
Team up with your friends in weekly challenges to become world famous fighters.

• JOIN OVER 100 MILLION GAMERS WORLDWIDE •
Follow @Naquatic on Facebook and Twitter to find out why our apps like MonsterCrafter and Shooting Showdown have been featured by everyone from Apple to IGN, AppAdvice, and TouchArcade.
